Usage: /usr/bin/donutsd [OPTIONS] Other Arguments

OPTIONS:
   -a STRING             Arguments to pass to donuts                            
   -z STRING             Time between checks                                    
   -t STRING             Temporary directory to store results in                
   -i STRING             File containing file/zonename/zonecontact pairings     
   -o                    Run once and exit                                      


E-Mail options:
   -s STRING             SMTP server to mail mail through (localhost)           
   -f STRING             From address to use when sending mail                  
   -x                    Include diff output in mail                            
   -e STRING             Email a result summary to ADDRESS                      

   -v                    Turn on verbose output                                 

Help Options:
   -h                    Display help options -- short flags preferred          
  --help                 Display help options -- long flags preferred           
  --help-full            Display all help options -- short and long
